name: Find your Life - Demo Edition 1
description:
Page appeared 15:36 IST 27 Jan 2020, Game was released on 27 December 2020

A small demo (or sample) game for a idea I have about a introduction to the meaning of Life. You enter a cave, talk to a guru who introduces you to it and leave.

I'm only starting here with this game, I'll improve as I learn game development
